QuestData.Title: Reference Material
QuestData.Description: I was in charge of the harvest golems - an important job until the Scourge destroyed most of our farmlands. I've an idea that would make the golems useful again, however.$B$BI think I can rewire the harvest collectors so they'll give us a hand fighting the Scourge.$B$BI'm not an expert at this just yet, so I'm going to need my manual. The problem is, I left it at the workshop... which happens to be that burning building next to the mine. Think you could go salvage it?
QuestData.LogDescription: Jeremiah Hawning wants you to retrieve the book "Fields, Factories and Workshops" from the burning building next to the mine in Farshire.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you get my book back?
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent! The information I need should be in here.
